resources.string: Welcome to the Leitner System, This app is designed to maximize your studying time by focusing on the areas that you need the most help with. Each category you create will have 5 boxes. If you answer a question correctly if goes into the next box if you answer the question incorrectly it goes into box 1.
- Box 1 will be asked every study session.
- Box 2, cards in box 2 are asked every second study session.
- Box 3, cards in box 3 are asked every 4th study session.
- Box 4, cards in box 4 are asked every 8th study session.
- Box 5, cards in box 5 are retired and won\'t be asked again.
Create a new Category by pressing the PLUS button in the bottom right. The Category name can be anything you want. Press the save Button.

After creating a category you can start to add questions. Select the newly created category to enter the question screen. You need to add a couple of question to get started. Press the Plus Button in the bottom right, enter a Question and a answer and hit save. Repeat this process until you run out of questions. You can always come back and add additional question later.

Now you can start your study session. You will be tested on the questions that are available to you. Review app description for more details on the question asked. Press the answer card to see the question answer. Select if answered the question correctly or incorrectly.
- Questions answered correctly will move to the next box.
- Questions answered incorrectly will go back to box 1
